<title level="1" right="Trait">[Titan](/Traits.aspx?ID=316)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 82

Titans are enormous, primordial creatures of neargodlike power who predate the mortal races.
name: Titan
